dialogue.text: The roseate spoonbill’s colors are the brightest early May.
The crowning jewel of avians in threskiornithidae.
Its favorite meal, carotenoids — they paint its wings in pink
While astaxanthin lies in wait and hydrocarbons sink.
why do i still try so hard
Uta! Look! We’d totally die if we fell from here right now!
Yeah, but...is that really something you want to be excited about?

Before the dialogue drifts further into unintended, unwanted, or uncertain directions, I want to take a minute to interrupt this Io event for the sake of shining a light on the rapidly declining mental state of me and my cat.
It all started one week when the sun was shining. Everything was good and I had just finished cloaking the outdoor plants and pipes in various quilts to shield them from the impending endless cold.
When I came back inside, I noticed a shine on the floor I couldn’t quite explain. Did someone wax it while I wasn’t looking? Unlikely. Was it dissolving? Also unlikely. It had to be a trick.

So I went upstairs, gripping the railing on the right as it fits my dominant hand better, hoping that today isn’t the day I accidentally pry it off of the wall and fall to my death. When, at the top of the stairs, I notice him.
His mouth is open in an attempt to meow, but no sound comes out. I mock him. He hates me. He tries again. No sound. I mock him again. Why can I meow, but he can not?

Have I been the cat this whole time? Has he been the human? Are words just arbitrary things we use to signify and explain ideas that can be better explained and emphasized by the balls in our eyes alone?
We sat on the couch. He curled up beside me. This is a lie.
I went to my room and locked him out behind a gate. He always disturbs me. He’s meowing right now. I can hear him. I know it came back. He was merely deceiving me.
That bastard. I will never forgive him. But more than that, I will never forgive myself for succumbing to the pressure of existing for the sole purpose of existing.
“When did this become so boring?” I ask myself, asking myself. “What was the meaning of that phone call?”
Anyway, that’s it. Back to Io.
Of course it’s something to be excited about! Any situation where you’re close to death is something to be excited about! It’s why amusement parks are so cool!
{i}That’s{/i} why they’re cool? Not because they’re little urban sanctuaries filled with fun rides and assorted street foods?
Those help too! But more than anything, they’re fun because they give us a chance to experience things we’d never be able to in real life!
But...this is real life right now.

Technically speaking, yes. But amusement parks exist in a special area between {i}real{/i} real life and {i}fake{/i} real life. Which is also known as fiction. Which is also known as where I want to be because it hurts less.
You’re weird. Are you experimenting with new drugs again?
No, I’m just happy I’m finally here.
Me too! I don’t get to see you actually have fun very often.
I’m sorry it’s with me and not Sensei, though. I know {i}he’s{/i} the one you really wanted to come with.

Don’t be sorry at all! You’re just as high up in the Io ranking as he is. And it’s not like I was aiming for it to be a {i}date,{/i} so this is perfect as far as I’m concerned! I just don’t know why it took us so long to come here.
Our schedules don’t always match up because of work and school. Like, when was the last time we {i}both{/i} had an entire weekend off?
Probably...never. I don’t think that’s happened once since you got sucked into the hellhole that is the maid cafe.
It’s not a hellhole, Io. I love working there. I’m just sad that it cuts into our time together. I like going on dates with you.
I literally just said that it wasn’t a date.
Noooo, you said you weren’t {i}aiming{/i} for it to be a date.
But seeing as {i}I{/i} paid and {i}I{/i} invited you out, {i}I{/i} get to decide what we call it. We are on a date.
Over Sensei already then? Am I the next obsession?
A date with him here {i}does{/i} sound enticing, right? Holding hands as you go up the ferris wheel...kissing beneath the moon once you reach the top.
Mhm.
We’re almost there, Io. Perhaps...{i}we{/i} should-
No thanks! You’ll be the first to know if my sexuality magically changes, though. I’ll just keep waiting for the adult male I’ve decided to like to kiss me up here instead.
How’s that going, by the way? You went over to his house the other day, didn’t you?
Yeah. We just sat in the dark and played games, though.
So a perfect Io date?
Nah. Not enough wood.
Curious. I imagined a perfect Io date wouldn’t involve any wood at all.
Ha ha ha. Bad Uta. I’m sending you to horny jail. You’ll need to roll doubles to escape and you can not collect $200 when you pass Go.
A boy and a girl...alone in the dark...huddled together in the glow of a computer...even {i}that{/i} doesn’t get your blood pumping, Io?
It...{i}does.{/i} Just not really in {i}that{/i} way, you know?
Ugh. I {i}wish{/i} I knew. I can’t even bump into the guy without wanting to get freaky anymore.
That sounds horrible.
It is.
But you know what isn’t? The fact that we can talk about it now.
Yeah, there seems to be a lot less “internal struggle” going on with you ever since telling me about your feelings. I’m happy for you, Uta.

I’m happy for {i}us,{/i} Io. There aren’t many best friends who’d be able to like the same guy and just openly talk about it like it’s no big deal at all. The fact that {i}we{/i} can survive it just means we’re the best.

Or that our thoughts on love and companionship have been mutilated beyond recognition due to our traumatic upbringings and resulted in an abnormally skewed perception of what it means to be with someone.
Don’t ruin it.
But ruining things is my specialty.
Yeah! But for a second, I thought it was going to be {i}mine{/i} since I’ve never had to admit to somebody I’m crushing on the same person as them before!
I like how you didn’t refute the fact that ruining things is my specialty and just went along with it.
There’s no use fighting with you when it comes to the way you think about yourself. I’ll only refute that if it’s someone {i}else{/i} who says it.
Regardless, I’m happy too. That we can talk about this. Even though I’ve kind of {i}always{/i} been open to talking about it and was just unaware that you {i}wanted{/i} to.
What do you think’s gonna happen if one of us actually gets him?

You mean if {i}you{/i} actually get him? Sensei would never choose me as a partner, even if he {i}does{/i} really care about me. I’m too lacking when it comes to aspects he actually requires in a person.
Like...the whole sex thing?
Right. And the fact that there’s no way I could ever help him with any of {i}his{/i} issues when you’ve seen how I handle mine. You, though? You’re great at that.

I’m not {i}great{/i} at anything, Io. We’re both screwed if getting help is going to be important to him. Especially since, on a baseline level, him getting help would effectively {i}destroy{/i} our chances.
Not mine if sex is the implication there. But also, you’re way wrong. You’ve helped me a ton, Uta.
And you’ve helped {i}me{/i} a ton too. But that doesn’t mean we’re any good compared to everyone else in the running. Neither one of us is in the top five of the love journal.
Buuuuuuuuut...if we combine {i}forces?...{/i}
You’re really gunning for this throuple thing, aren’t you?
Just imagine it! All {i}three{/i} of us on the ferris wheel! Me holding his hand and talking about how close to death we are while the two of you do, like...sex stuff.
On a ferris wheel? Right next to you?
You would. You know it.
Yes, but I would {i}not{/i} be proud.
Well, whatever happens Uta...I’m glad I get to go through it with you.
You really are the best thing that’s ever happened to me. And it is {i}because{/i} we are so close to death that you can trust me when I say that.
I’d trust you either way, Io. You’re the best thing that’s ever happened to me too.
Also, we’ve finally reached the top of the ferris wheel. So if you {i}are{/i} looking to kiss someone up here-
I’m good, Uta. Also, this ferris wheel is, like...crazy slow, isn’t it?
Right? We’ve barely moved this whole time.
The thing goes around and eventually completes a cycle or something and then the ride ends and then they get off of it because Uta needs to pee. Narration.
I need to pee!
Also Blue Air comes on and changes the mood. Something is probably about to happen.
Why do you seem so proud of that?
Because I held it in for what I can only imagine is the longest ferris wheel ride in all of Japan!
Okay. Well, the bathroom is right there. So.
Aren’t you going to offer to come with me?
Why would I do that?
Because we’re girls and that’s what girls do.
Why?
Well...because.
{i}Okaaaay!{/i} Guess I’ll just go to the bathroom alone then! Sure hope nothing happens to me!
But...after that? Rollercoasters.
Fuck yeah.
We’re staying here until they kick us out tonight. I hope you’re ready, bitch.
I was born ready, other bitch.
Let’s not call each other “bitch” anymore. I love you too much.
I love you too, Uta. That felt wrong and I’m sorry.
Kaybye! Be right back! Don’t go anywhere!
“Where would I even go in the first place?” she thought to herself, removing a phone from her pocket that she’d neglected to look at since approximately 2:00 PM.
She hadn’t received even a single notification within that time, though. Sensei must have been done playing that game and sending her progress updates.
She didn’t expect him to ever go back to it without being pushed or reminded to, but she liked how he kept her in the loop for a whole night. Like he was actually thinking about her.

Which he probably wasn’t right now. And that made her want to text him. But she didn’t, because she thought that would be annoying. And this was essentially the only way Io ever used her phone in the first place.
Type something out. Erase it. Scroll through older messages. Scroll through her photo reel to find candid photos she’d taken of him from her desk when he used to come to school.
It wasn’t a {i}good{/i} use of her time. But it was enough to bridge the gap between different bouts of nothingness on the way to something that {i}might{/i} be good.
This was the best day she’d had in a long time, and he hadn’t even been involved. So why was there this urge to involve him {i}now?{/i}
She got caught up in this question for so long that she didn’t even notice she was being approached by two large men.
They’d seen her at several points throughout the day. Her stupid hair made her stick out.
They joked among each other about using her twintails as handlebars for impure purposes. What they said about her friend was even worse.
But right now, they said nothing. They just stood in front of the girl, waiting for her to notice them.
Go away.
And then she did. But it was not in the way they wanted.
{i}Go away?{/i} Can a guy not even walk up to a girl anymore without her trying to turn it into a thing?
Maybe she’s deaf? Try-
{i}Speaking louder and drawing attention to ourselves? Are you a fucking idiot? Just let me work my magic.{/i}
I hope it’s to make yourself disappear, because I want nothing to do with either of you.
Aaaah, so you can hear us after all. What are you up to? Where’d your friend go?
Home. And my ride will be here any second now, so you should probably leave.
The hell’s your problem? All we did was walk up to you.
Yeah. We just wanted to see if you and you and your friend wanted to go somewhere together.
Welp. She’s not here, so I guess that defeats the purpose. Bye.
How about {i}just{/i} you?
Yeah. Think you can handle both of us, little girl?
{i}Don’t creep her out, man. You’re coming on too strong.{/i}
{i}But that’s what-{/i}
{i}Yeah, I know what the goal is. But that’s not how this works. Just let me do the talking.{/i}
Why are you even here?...Shouldn’t you be in space or something?
Space? You kidding? Do we look like the type to get roped into that bullshit? You should see the car I pulled up in. It’d get you wetter than the log flume.
{i}Yeah. And I’m the one who comes on too strong.{/i}
{i}Fuck off.{/i}
I’m asexual.
Translation — I ain’t had a good dick yet.
Probably hasn’t had one at all. She’s a sophomore, max.
I bet her friend has. {i}She{/i} looked like she could handle both of us. This one’s just a prude.
Mm...
Whatcha looking at on your phone there? Mind showing us?
In fact, why not just {i}give{/i} us your phone? I won’t keep it, I promise. I just want to put my contact info in there.
Daisuke, hold up. There’s someone-
It’s {i}fine.{/i} We’re not doing anything wrong. We’re just talking to our new friend here. What’s your name? I don’t bite.
{size=-20}Leave me alone.{/i}
What was that? I couldn’t hear you.
I said...{i}leave me a-{/i}
You ain’t...gotta say shit...to punks like them.
Huh? Who-
Oh, fuck! Isn’t that-
W-What are you doing, you crazy bitch?! His bones are made of glass!
Well...he should’ve thought about that...before pickin’ on a fuckin’ high school girl!
My...fragile...everything! I can’t move!
Yuki?! What are you-
Leave them...to me! I...can handle this!
Is he bleeding out of his {i}eyes?{/i}
If he ain’t already...he’s about to be!
N-No! Don’t! Stop! Please!
Daisuke! No! His eyes were made of glass too!
Omar! I can’t see! I can’t fucking see!
I’ve got you, buddy! I’ve got you!
Yeah...take him. And while you’re at it, do yourselves a fuckin’ favor and...never come around here again...you got that?
Y-Yeah! You’ll never see us again! Just p...please! D...Don’t tell the boss we-
Do you want some too?! Huh?!
{i}Aaaah! No! Don’t hurt me!{/i}
{i}Omar...I...I can see the light...{/i}
{i}Hang in there, Daisuke! Hang in there!{/i}
Yuki! That...was so fucking cool! Like, where did you even {i}come{/i} from?! If I wasn’t seconds away from having a panic attack, I’d-
Hah....hah....haah...
Yuki?...
Is everything...alright?
Never...better...
You look terrible...Did something happen?
Forget about me...what are you doing here...alone?...
I’m with Uta. She just went into the bathroom and....what...what are {i}you{/i} doing here?
Meeting...someone...
Those guys come up to you...outta nowhere?...
I...yeah. I was just waiting here and-
That happens again...just tell ‘em...you know me...
You got it?...
Yuki...you’re so pale...I really think you should-
I’m fine...but....I’ve...gotta go...
Remember...say my name...if shit...mngh...gets...bad!
Io! What happened?! I heard yelling! But I was already in the middle of stuff and-
Is that Yumi’s mom? What’s she doing here?
She...saved me from...these two fucking creepy guys...
What?!
One of them had glass bones. It was weird.
You’re okay though? They didn’t hurt you? They didn’t touch you? I’m sorry I wasn’t here. If I knew, I-
Would have held it in forever?
If that’s what it takes to protect you.
I’m fine, Uta. Thank you.
But I...
I’m worried about Yuki...
I’ve never seen her so-
Tell me at home. The bus just pulled up. We should catch it before it leaves.
What? But I thought you said they’d have to kick us out-
That was {i}before{/i} you were apparently almost abducted! We’ll come back for the rollercoasters soon. It’s not safe tonight.
But-
Hot dogs. Konbini. As many as you want.
Ugh. You’re lucky I’m hungry.
I’m lucky you’re {i}safe.{/i} Now, come on. Hold my hand.
Do I really have to-
Hold my fucking hand, bitch!
Wow. That was the shortest pact we’ve ever made, other bitch.
I’m sorry and I love you. Again.
I love you too. Again. But love can wait! It’s wiener time!
Did somebody say “wiener time?”
...Wait, what?
Why did I just jump out of bed to say that? That’s not even the line.
{i}Somewhere else, two girls were safe.{/i}
{i}One woman wasn’t.{/i}
